segment.source: High-level info about some of the new and updated features for Internet Explorer 11.
segment.target: High-level info about some of the new and updated features for Internet Explorer 11.

segment.source: List of updated features and tools - Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: List of updated features and tools - Internet Explorer 11 (IE11) (Internet Explorer 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: List of updated features and tools - Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)
segment.target: List of updated features and tools - Internet Explorer 11 (IE11)

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1 Update
segment.target: Windows 8.1 Update

segment.source: Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows 7 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: Windows Server 2012 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2012 R2

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 with Service Pack 1 (SP1)

segment.source: Internet Explorer 11 includes several new features and tools.
segment.target: Internet Explorer 11 includes several new features and tools.

segment.source: This topic includes high-level info about the each of them.
segment.target: This topic includes high-level info about the each of them.

segment.source: Updated features and tools
segment.target: Updated features and tools

segment.source: Updated web standards.
segment.target: Updated web standards.

segment.source: WebGL, Canvas 2D L2 extensions, fullscreen API, encrypted media extensions, media source extensions, CSS flexible box layout module, mutation observers, like DOM4 and 5.3.
segment.target: WebGL, Canvas 2D L2 extensions, fullscreen API, encrypted media extensions, media source extensions, CSS flexible box layout module, mutation observers, like DOM4 and 5.3.

segment.source: Enhanced Protected Mode.
segment.target: Enhanced Protected Mode.

segment.source: Extends Protected Mode to further restrict the ability of an attacker to access sensitive or personal information in personal and corporate environments.
segment.target: Extends Protected Mode to further restrict the ability of an attacker to access sensitive or personal information in personal and corporate environments.

segment.source: This feature is turned off by default.
segment.target: This feature is turned off by default.

segment.source: For more info, see Enhanced Protected Mode problems with Internet Explorer.
segment.target: For more info, see Enhanced Protected Mode problems with Internet Explorer.

segment.source: Enterprise Mode.
segment.target: Enterprise Mode.

segment.source: Enterprise Mode, a compatibility mode that runs on IE11 on Windows 8.1 Update and Windows 7 devices, lets websites render using a modified browser configuration that’s designed to emulate Windows Internet Explorer 8, avoiding the common compatibility problems associated with web apps written and tested on older versions of Internet Explorer.
segment.target: Enterprise Mode, a compatibility mode that runs on IE11 on Windows 8.1 Update and Windows 7 devices, lets websites render using a modified browser configuration that’s designed to emulate Windows Internet Explorer 8, avoiding the common compatibility problems associated with web apps written and tested on older versions of Internet Explorer.

segment.source: For more info, see What is Enterprise Mode?
segment.target: For more info, see What is Enterprise Mode?

segment.source: Out-of-date ActiveX control blocking.
segment.target: Out-of-date ActiveX control blocking.

segment.source: Helps to keep your ActiveX controls up-to-date, because malicious software (or malware) can target security flaws in outdated controls, damaging your computer by collecting info from it, installing unwanted software, or by letting someone else control it remotely.
segment.target: Helps to keep your ActiveX controls up-to-date, because malicious software (or malware) can target security flaws in outdated controls, damaging your computer by collecting info from it, installing unwanted software, or by letting someone else control it remotely.

segment.source: For more info, see Out-of-date ActiveX control blocking.
segment.target: For more info, see Out-of-date ActiveX control blocking.

segment.source: Do Not Track (DNT) exceptions.
segment.target: Do Not Track (DNT) exceptions.

segment.source: IE11 lets websites ask whether to track users as they browse a website.
segment.target: IE11 lets websites ask whether to track users as they browse a website.

segment.source: If the user approves the request, IE records an exception to the "Do Not Track" rule and sends headers to the website that allow tracking.
segment.target: If the user approves the request, IE records an exception to the "Do Not Track" rule and sends headers to the website that allow tracking.

segment.source: By respecting these headers and requesting exceptions to the default privacy settings, website owners can develop a trusted relationship with their users about privacy.
segment.target: By respecting these headers and requesting exceptions to the default privacy settings, website owners can develop a trusted relationship with their users about privacy.

segment.source: For more info, see Internet Explorer 11 - FAQ for IT Pros.
segment.target: For more info, see Internet Explorer 11 - FAQ for IT Pros.

segment.source: IE Administration Kit (IEAK).
segment.target: IE Administration Kit (IEAK).

segment.source: Lets you create custom, branded versions of IE11.
segment.target: Lets you create custom, branded versions of IE11.

segment.source: For more info and to download the tool, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros.
segment.target: For more info and to download the tool, see Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11) - Administration Guide for IT Pros.

segment.source: Unattend Settings.
segment.target: Unattend Settings.

segment.source: Lets you update the Unattend.xml file, to customize the home page, favorites, search providers, feeds, Accelerators, Web Slices, and settings for top result searches.
segment.target: Lets you update the Unattend.xml file, to customize the home page, favorites, search providers, feeds, Accelerators, Web Slices, and settings for top result searches.

segment.source: For more info, see the Unattend Settings: Microsoft-Windows-IE-InternetExplorer.
segment.target: For more info, see the Unattend Settings: Microsoft-Windows-IE-InternetExplorer.
